abstract: New York Jets sign defensive linemen Steve McLendon and Jarvis Jenkins.
lead_paragraph: Nose tackle Steve McLendon, formerly of the Steelers, and defensive end Jarvis Jenkins, who spent last season with the Bears, joined the Jets.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Jets Add Two Defenders

snippet: Nose tackle Steve McLendon, formerly of the Steelers, and defensive end Jarvis Jenkins, who spent last season with the Bears, joined the Jets.
